archimate:Requirement.name: SG.1.2.1: A full-time Chief Information Security Officer (CISO), or equivalent, should be appointed at executive management level, supported by a specialist information security function, with overall responsibility for the organisation's information security programme.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
